title: LF team Bronze-Diamond+
body:
I Have played previously played for a diamond team and looking for something more serious and team oriented.

I can play every role though I main ADC.

Available 24/7.

22 years old

Voice comms etc

Can play anything asked of me.

IGN: whitepumah

replies.body:
Hey I'm also looking to climb out of bronze. Haven't got coms but I main mid and top but I can semi sup and jungle enough not to feed. 
Mostly looking for a positive team. Getting tired of flamers and trolls.
Where do i know you from?
